column2:
"This route is the shortest
distance to the southern base."

"We break in, clear out enemies,
and take control of the area. ...Any questions?"

"Everyone's starting to reach the limits of their fatigue...
I wonder if it'll be okay to continue like this."

"...Even if they resign here, there's
no guarantees there'll be a next time."

"Indeed. We've actually invested
all of Stia Camp's fighting power into this, so..."
"Thanks to your cooperation, I would estimate our current situation... is the best one we're going to get."
